member.summary: Gets inventory information for items in the catalog feed.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Personalization.Commerce.CatalogFeed.IEntryInventoryService.GetInventory(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{EPiServer.Commerce.Catalog.ContentTypes.VariationContent})
member.summary: Get the available inventory quantity for a product, to include in the catalog feed and use as input to the algorithms for product recommendations. This may be the sum, max, min or other value based on the provided product variations and inventory available across warehouses.
member.returns: The available quantity.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Personalization.Commerce.CatalogFeed.IEntryInventoryService.GetInventory(EPiServer.Commerce.Catalog.ContentTypes.EntryContentBase)
member.summary: Gets the inventory quantity for a specific entry, to include in the catalog feed and use as input to the algorithms for product recommendations. This method gets the inventory the individual variations of a product, but also to get the inventory for packages. This may be the sum, max, min or other value based on the inventory available across warehouses.
member.param: The entry to get the inventory quantity for.
member.returns: The available quantity.

The root element of the response from the widget API.
